archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Maintenance
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.13] The purpose of the Maintenance process is to sustain the capability of the system to provide a service.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 97

properties.value: Gemäß ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 (laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE): "[6.4.13] Der Zweck des Prozesses "Wartung" besteht darin, die Fähigkeit des Systems, seine Dienste zu erbringen, aufrechtzuerhalten".
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.13] The purpose of the Maintenance process is to sustain the capability of the system to provide a service.
